duties_responsibilities.duty: Creates and edits documents with speed and accuracy, finalizes files for digital output and may assist with printing and duplication.
Understands and anticipates customer needs to exceed expectations and creates a positive customer experience.
Responsible for all phases of project management, including customer service, proper documentation, and effective communications.
Performs data input, editing, formatting, mail merging, and revisions, including grammar, spelling, punctuation, and checks for mathematical accuracy.
Assists with print production, prepares files for printing/electronic deliverables and performs standard electronic file management, including archiving and records management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Office Management, or a related field (Advanced certification preferred)
